text: Shmaryahu Yosef Chaim Kanievsky (January 8, 1928 - March 18, 2022) was a Polish-born Israeli rabbi and posek. He was born in Pinsk, Second Polish Republic, but his career was set in Bnei Brak, Israel. Kanievsky was thought to be a leading authority in Haredi Jewish society.שקל הישועות של גדול הדור הרב חיים קנייבסקי שליט''א - אחינוArtScroll.com - A Gadol in Our Time: Stories about Rav Chaim Kanievsky - In Stock at ArtScroll! Kanievsky had a heart attack at his home in Bnei Brak on March 18, 2022.Leading Haredi rabbi Kanievsky collapses, undergoing CPR He died a few hours later at the age of 94.Leader of Lithuanian ultra-Orthodox Community Rabbi Chaim Kanievsky Dies at 94 ==References== Category:1928 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:Polish Jews Category:Israeli rabbis
title: Chaim Kanievsky
